i got married to my highschool friend.

content.text: I'm going to sign up for a singing competition to show my parents that I can make a career out of it.
Wow, that's really brave! Good for you! I hope you do well.
Thank you! I'm nervous but excited. I've been singing since I was a little girl, but I've never had the courage to sing in front of an audience before.
Well, I'm sure you'll do great! You seem like you're really passionate about it.
Thanks! I am. Singing is my passion.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have something that you're so passionate about.
Yeah, it's really important to have something that you love to do.
I agree. I love my job, but it's not my passion. My passion is animals.
That's really cool! I've always loved animals too.
Me too! I grew up on a farm in the Midwest, so I was always surrounded by animals.
That sounds like it was a lot of fun!
It was! I loved being able to play with all the animals.
I'm jealous! I've always wanted to live on a farm.
You should! It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
